LightningComponentBundle.description: Present content from a remote RSS feed.

property.name: feedUrlEndpoint
property.label: Provide the RSS Feed Url. Ensure a remote site setting record exists for the URL in Salesforce.

property.name: feedRecordsToShow
property.label: Number of records to show. We'll grab as many as returned if no limit is specified.

property.name: listEmptyText
property.label: Empty List Text: shown when the feed is empty.

property.name: listErrorText
property.label: Error text: shown when the feed fails.
property.default: Failed to return any items. Ensure a remote site setting record is created for the URL you're using.

property.name: customClass
property.label: Custom Class Name
property.description: Custom CSS class name. Usually remains blank.

property.name: debug
property.label: Debug?
property.description: Triggers console.logs if debugger is enabled
